column4: ug why is "grep ^Anchor Text:[.*chlamydia.*]$ " returning more then a single line that doesnt contain what i'm looking for
in Regexps, [] denote a character class.  So anything inside of it becomes what its looking for, and its looking for one of them.
Please use pastbin, it'll let me see what you're getting hits on.  Also, pastebin your regexp again, and *also* if you don't mind, can we move this to #ubuntu-offtopic?
